about.details:
Incorporated in 2011, Positioned as "Born Digital. Born Agile" Happiest Minds Ltd is a Bangalore based IT service provider company. The business of the company is divided into three categories; Digital Business Service (DBS), Product Engineering Service (PES) and Infrastructure and Management Security Service ( IMSS).

The DBS unit offers digital application development & modernisation, assistance in designing & testing of operations, management of the platform, consulting and domain led offerings.

PES unit helps by transforming the potential of digital by making the product secure and smart. Wherein, IMSS provides an end to end monitoring and management capability for applications and infrastructure of the clients.

As of June 30, 2020, Happiest Minds had 148 active customers and has a global presence in countries like US, UK, Australia, Canada and the Middle East. The business units of the company is assisted by the 3 Centres of Excellence which are Internet of Things, Analytics / Artificial Intelligence, and Digital Process Automation. In Fiscal 2020, 96.9% of the company's revenues came from digital services which is one of the highest among Indian IT companies.

Happiest Minds delivers services across industry sectors such as Retail, Edutech, Industrial, BFSI, Hi-Tech, Engineering R&D, Manufacturing, Travel, Media and Entertainment.

Competitive Strengths

1. Focused on software product development
2. Strong Brand in offering Digital IT services
3. End to End digital lifecycle
4. Agile Engineering and Delivery

faqs.question: What is the Happiest Minds IPO?
faqs.answer:
Happiest Minds IPO is a main-board IPO of 42290091 equity shares of the face value of ₹2 aggregating up to ₹702.02 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹166 per share. The minimum order quantity is 90.

The IPO opens on September 7, 2020, and closes on September 9, 2020.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Happiest Minds IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Happiest Minds IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Happiest Minds IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Happiest Minds IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Happiest Minds IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Happiest Minds IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Happiest Minds IPO opens on September 7, 2020 and closes on September 9, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Happiest Minds IPO?
faqs.answer: Happiest Minds IPO lot size is 90, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,940.

faqs.question: How to apply for Happiest Minds IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Happiest Minds IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Happiest Minds IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Happiest Minds IPO will be done on Monday, September 14, 2020, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, September 15, 2020. Check the Happiest Minds IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Happiest Minds IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Happiest Minds IPO listing date is on Thursday, September 17, 2020.
